description: Numbers n such that 7*10^n + R_n is prime, where R_n = 11...1 is the repunit (A002275) of length n.
comments: Also numbers n such that (64*10^n-1)/9 is prime.No other terms below 820000. - _Serge Batalov_, Sep 22 2014
links: Makoto Kamada, Prime numbers of the form 711...11.
Index entries for primes involving repunits
author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Aug 11 2000
extensions: A new PRP term from _Serge Batalov_, Aug 13 2009
